meanings.definition: The act of adding multiple colors to something.
meanings.sent1: The polychroming of the painting made it vibrant and eye-catching.
meanings.sent2: She learned the art of polychroming to enhance her pottery designs.
meanings.sent3: The polychroming of the cupcakes made them look like a rainbow party.
meanings.sent4: His polychroming of the room transformed it into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The polychroming of the garden brought it to life with a burst of colors.

meanings.definition: The process of decorating with various colors.
meanings.sent1: The polychroming of the room with different hues created a cheerful atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The artist's polychroming of the mural added depth and interest to the wall.
meanings.sent3: The polychroming of the cake with bright colors made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her polychroming of the outfit with bold shades made a fashion statement.
meanings.sent5: The polychroming of the building facade made it stand out among the rest.
